title: Aggressive Russian
description: Her dad asks me to watch her... from a distance.She doesn't even know I exist, until I can't stay away any longer.I should tell her the truth about what's really going on, hidden in plain sight.Her future is bright, and she deserves to know everything, including the darkness in my life...and hers.But all she really needs to know is that she will be mine, no matter who, or what, tries to get in my way.*Aggressive Russian is an insta-everything standalone instalove romance with an HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger.
author: Flora Ferrari
